question.title: Recommendations
question.content: "To take this test, you must be fasting from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m. For a 24-hour period, each time you urinate, collect your urine in a sterile urine collection cup. Do not forget to clean your hands before each sample collection, we recommend the use of sterile gloves."

question.title: Recommendations
question.content: Do not perform this test if you are undergoing antibiotic treatment, if this is the case, wait 3 days after finishing it. If you are a person with a vulva (vagina) you should not be in your menstrual period. Before taking the urine sample, clean your hands and genital area, then in a sterile collection cup for urine, collect the first urine of the day, discarding the first stream into the toilet and use the rest for the sample (middle urination) . We recommend you the use of gloves and prevent the glass and your urine from coming into contact with the genitals, so as not to contaminate and alter the results of your test.

Hyssop or PeeCanter
Lancet
2 collection tubes
instruction sheet
return envelope

question.title: Description of your kit
question.content: With our Black kit we can detect up to 13 different its. The sample type for our Black kit is: Person with vulva: cervical, vaginal and blood sample. People with a penis: urethral, ​​urine and blood samples.

question.title: Description of your kit
question.content:
With our Gold kit we can detect up to 7 different STIs.
The sample type for our Gold kit is: Person with a vagina: vaginal sample
Person with penis: urine sample

question.title: Description of your kit
question.content: With our HPV kit we can detect the human papillomavirus including high and low risk genotypes. The sample type for our platinum kit is: People with vulva: cervical sample. People with a penis: urethral or urine sample

question.title: What does it detect?
question.content:
• VPH genotipos de bajo riesgo: 6, 11, 40, 42, 43, 44, 54, 61, 70
  • VPH genotipos de alto riesgo: 16,18, 26, 31, 33, 35, 39, 45, 51, 52, 53, 56, 58, 59, 66, 68, 69, 73, 82.

question.title: What does your kit include?
question.content:
• - Hisopo ó PeeCanter
  • - Lanceta
  • - 2 Tubos de recolección
  • - Hoja de instrucciones
  • - Sobre de devolución

question.title: Description of your kit
question.content:
Con nuestro kit VPH podemos detectar el virus del papiloma humano incluidos los genotipos de alto y bajo riesgo.

El tipo de muestra para nuestro kit VPH es:

  • Personas con vulva: muestra cervical
  • Personas con pene: muestra uretral o de orina

question.title: What does it detect?
question.content: Detects if the patient has produced antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus due to a past infection or due to having been vaccinated

question.title: Who is the test recommended for?
question.content: For patients who want to know if they had the coronavirus that causes COVID-19 without having presented symptoms.

question.title: When do we deliver your results?
question.content: Results in 48 business hours from the time the sample is received in the laboratory.

question.title: How are samples obtained?
question.content: How are antibody test samples obtained?

question.title: What does it detect?
question.content: This test allows a rapid diagnosis of COVID-19 infection for patients with a high viral load, identifying the virus proteins in their body.

question.title: Who is the test recommended for?
question.content: This test is indicated in patients with symptoms, in other cases it could generate false negative results.

question.title: When do we deliver your results?
question.content:
Results in 20 minutes (verbally)
Laboratory report (written result) in a maximum of 5 hours after the sample is received in the laboratory.

question.title: How are the samples for the PCR test obtained?
question.content: Infected cells are obtained from the nose and throat using swabs.

question.title: When is it advisable to do this test?
question.content: If the patient has symptoms or if they were in contact with a confirmed case.

question.title: What does it detect?
question.content: Detects if the patient has the COVID-19 and influenza virus.

question.title: Who is the test recommended for?
question.content: For patients who have symptoms similar to COVID-19.

question.title: When do we deliver your results?
question.content: Results in 24 business hours from the time the sample is received in the laboratory.

question.title: How are samples obtained?
question.content: This test is by swab.

question.title: When is it advisable to do this test?
question.content: If you don't know if you have COVID-19 or the flu.

question.title: What does it detect?
question.content: It detects the virus at the exact moment of the test with a high level of precision.

question.title: Who is the test recommended for?
question.content: For asymptomatic patients, symptomatic or who had contact with infected people.

question.title: When do we deliver your results?
question.content: Results in 24 business hours from the time the sample is received in the laboratory

question.title: How are samples obtained?
question.content: Infected cells are obtained from the nose and throat using swabs.

question.title: When is it advisable to do this test?
question.content: If the patient has symptoms or if they were in contact with a confirmed case.
